title: Novavax, JD.com, Carnival: What to Watch When the Stock Market Opens Today
sub_head: Novavax cited positive results for its vaccine; Tencent dumped most of its stake in JD.com
body:
Stock futures are ticking higher ahead of the final trading session before the Christmas holiday. Here’s what we’re watching in Thursday’s action:
Write to James Willhite at james.willhite@wsj.com
